channel.title: JMadness Server Progress [508] Updated 9/20 HD!
channel.description:
[b][size=14pt]JMadness a.k.a. Jungle Madness[/size][/b] This blog if you will is split into two parts [b]1. The code edits that don't require screenies[/b] [b]2. The code/features that can be taken pictures of[/b]
Sadly the server has been in development since 6/28 and this is first time I have logged any changes so I don't keep version numbers and I don't know the order nor the date I changed each individual thing. Anyways to the good stuff.
[size=10pt]Section one. Edits with no screenies[/size] 1.Drops fixed and properly given to the npc killer not person first in players list 2.Projectiles fixed on Npcs. No more White screen or lack of projectiles. 3.Perfect anti-Multi logging system that prevents flooding. 4.Fixed all Item gathering skills Fishing Woodcutting Mining ect So that you do not get a constant rate of items and your level/pick/axe effect the rate you get the fish/log ect. Also mining rocks deplete like rs. 5.Random events added. But considering removing cause they pesty and dumb. 6. Ok so Null pointer fixes..... Summon Npc null pointer fixed Attacking Npc null pointer fixed Player vs null. null pointer fixed Player logging while pvp... pvp null pointer fixed Null item drop. null pointer fixed 7.Also reworked all timers from old system because they suck balls. replaced 50 timers with some 10 maybe 11 timer. and yes everything works perfect I'm not retarted. 8. Fully redid Login system to remove the 8 second freeze on login for client and server. 9. Added some 10-30 maps that I don't remember 10.Most importantly I used proper runescape formulas for calculating all damage. Which means your armor actually protects you.... -_-
[size=10pt]Section Two. Edits with screenies[/size] 1.Fully working Farming with 16 fully working plants and Nature ammy which says your crop condition. Also save system which properly saves the plants current timer and the current state. Also rewritten default global objects to personal current crop plants so farming is seamless and flawless. [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/farming2-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/farmshop-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/farming-1.png[/img]
2. Fully working pvp system that uses alliances of the holy vs evil. Obviously holy players cant kill holy and evil cant kill evil. Also take note of pvp points. [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/sides.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/evilfriend.png[/img]
3. Edited the construction from old garbage system [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/conchair.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/conportal.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/contree.png[/img]
4. Holy and Evil city. Both equipped with guards that aggro to the opposing side... Holy guard aggros to evil players Also each city has their own skills that are limited[b] to the city not the alliance[/b] which means a holy player can level an evil skill but it is much harder as to level it he/she must go to evil city... lolz [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/evilguards.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/evilmine.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/pickinevilcity.png[/img]
5. Yes there are the original 508 bulby customs such as dragon pl8 and full helm yada yada. But some server code side customs include the magic comp bow. C bow also works but forgot to take a picture and dont feel like going back to take more and upload them 0.o Chins [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/flyingturd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/flyingturd2.png[/img] magic comp ice arrow. Which will ricochet off of 2 people. Hitting a maximum of 3 people with decreasing power. Maximum ricochet distance is 5 squares. [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/magiccompicearrow-1.png[/img] magic comp fire arrow. Simply hits target 2 times with decreased power [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/magiccompfirearrow-1.png[/img] fully working autocast for all magic.. ancient barrages work on npcs and players [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/Ancientsautocast.png[/img]
6. Redid skills with guides and realistic methods for leveling. Also all levels follow the 50x runescape exp rule. Also all npcs use proper animations for attack def and die. [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/properanim.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/rc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/evilsmith.png[/img]
7. A pvp city that the holy and evil players battle for. It is similar to a minigame but it is always on and players entry to the city is right outside the gate. The city checks the number of holy vs evil players in the city and gives control to that side. Every player on the controlling side gets a cash flow from city. This helps the beginning players get some grip. Also the money gained increases by how long that one side has had control and resets when control is lost or changed. 10k,25k,50k,75k,100k and stops at 100k which will continually give 100k to controllers. [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/evilpvp.png[/img]
8. Also some other little features that I can't think of. But there is hire slave which is similar to runescape's assistance but the hirer pays a constant amount per exp gained by the slave. The slave also gets the gold per exp earned for the master. The slave master gets all the exp and is forced to pay or the level is reset to 1. This ensures the master doesn't try to hire slave without any cash in inv or bank ect. If cash is not found for exp then level that he hired for is set to 1. The funds are automatically calculated for exp earned and the master can set a maximum for how much exp he wants the slave to earn him. [IMG]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/hireslave.png[/img]
------Things I missed------ Sorry forgot but there are pvp shops but I ddn't take photos and the projectiles [b]DO NOT CRASH CLIENT[/b] that has been fixed and I even posted a Tut which very quickly was replied "snippet" lol.
This server is not public yet and is under extreme construction.
===Credits=== [b]ALL BASE AND CORE CREDITS GO TO MEZZYSCAPE/BULBY/PALIDINO76[/b] For all the changes Credits break Like this 90% Halolouie/Halolouis 2% Username/Kesha 8% Epidemik
Final thoughts.....
Flame me and I will eat your first born. =]
jul 12 [size=24pt]---------------------------------EDIT 9/20/2010 10:36PM -----------------------------------------------------[/size] New pictures added will ad description l8er!!!! These are pictures of the server V0.8 Current Project... Hunter =] anways to the good stuff. HD!! W00t! [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/player.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/skills.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/requirements.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/inspect.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/inscriptionpg1.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/Inscriptionp2.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/Inscribingaction.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/Inscribeuse.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/HDcustoms.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/HDBOB.png[/img] [img]http://i990.photobucket.com/albums/af26/halolouie/HD%20updates/Chinchompa.png[/img]
More l8er i am so freaking tired I can't make one more pic lol. Btw the classes do work but I only showed the warrior. There are : Warrior, Priest, Mage, Hunter, Rogue, and Knight with that I bid you fellow moparscapers goodnight.
P.S. If someone can help me fix the DC Glitch I will fricking make love with you for eternity. Lol jk. Just someone plz help with that. (Client keeps crashing with a throwable error...)

item.title: JMadness Server Progress [508] Updated 9/20 HD!
item.dc:creator: @caelan caelan
item.description:
@caelan wrote:

[quote=“caelan, post:45, topic:348633”][quote author=doombolt link=topic=445013.msg3395563#msg3395563 date=1289339377]
hey halolouie lol a certain someone is on this acc. witches me -.- lol it’s CAELAN ive been trying to connect to the server for atleast 6months now. Plz respond. i really wanna go online :’( . in uasul fact do u know the client link? mite meet u on server sooner or later. once i get client.
[/quote]

about the doombolt account i wasn’t stuffed coz i was in a rush…now im fine and created new account and i also emailed you on my new email account. i hope i dont get demoted for this =S im awfully sorry but it’s easter and i finnaly found ur forum again so i can chat i luv the new updates u added they r so cool, i cant stop repeating it ;D lol i was asking if u had a forum so i could chat with others. i hav a suggestion…bcuz i luv cats…i suggest that can u add pets? or hav u already done that?if u hav then dont mind.my friend on regretless might join (cold blooded) i mite advertise more…kk thx halouie =] and can u make it online at all times? coz i could lookout for new ppl. kk i hope u reply ;D[/quote]

hello i had internet problems so i could not do anything…cold blooded i said in the other quote is the same timezone as me so we could both lookout or advertise, i uasully go on forum chats and advertise. I dont really mind what u email me like the ip…if ip ill go back on if client might take a little while…but the ip doesn’t work bcuz ur addin thing’s when uve finished just tell me i can go back on and the ip coz i frgt it and i wanna go back on bad ;)=S . When ur on im it’s like 6-8pm but bcuz of holiday i can stay up to 11pm ;D the scary thing is i wrote all of this with one hand in 1 min…i broke the other .

Read full topic

item.title: JMadness Server Progress [508] Updated 9/20 HD!
item.dc:creator: @TommyTomTom TommyTomTom
item.description:
@TommyTomTom wrote:

[quote=“halolouis, post:1, topic:348633”][size=14pt]JMadness a.k.a. Jungle Madness[/size]
This blog if you will is split into two parts
1. The code edits that don’t require screenies
2. The code/features that can be taken pictures of

Sadly the server has been in development since 6/28 and this is first time I have logged any changes so
I don’t keep version numbers and I don’t know the order nor the date I changed each individual thing.
Anyways to the good stuff.

[size=10pt]Section one. Edits with no screenies[/size]
1.Drops fixed and properly given to the npc killer not person first in players list
2.Projectiles fixed on Npcs. No more White screen or lack of projectiles.
3.Perfect anti-Multi logging system that prevents flooding.
4.Fixed all Item gathering skills
Fishing
Woodcutting
Mining
ect
So that you do not get a constant rate of items and your level/pick/axe effect
the rate you get the fish/log ect. Also mining rocks deplete like rs.
5.Random events added. But considering removing cause they pesty and dumb.
6. Ok so Null pointer fixes…
Summon Npc null pointer fixed
Attacking Npc null pointer fixed
Player vs null. null pointer fixed
Player logging while pvp… pvp null pointer fixed
Null item drop. null pointer fixed
7.Also reworked all timers from old system because they suck balls.
replaced 50 timers with some 10 maybe 11 timer.
and yes everything works perfect I’m not retarted.
8. Fully redid Login system to remove the 8 second
freeze on login for client and server.
9. Added some 10-30 maps that I don’t remember
10.Most importantly I used proper runescape formulas
for calculating all damage. Which means your armor
actually protects you… -_-

[size=10pt]Section Two. Edits with screenies[/size]
1.Fully working Farming with 16 fully working plants and Nature ammy which says your crop condition.
Also save system which properly saves the plants current timer and the current state. Also rewritten
default global objects to personal current crop plants so farming is seamless and flawless.

farming2-1.png781×541

farmshop-1.png781×541

farming-1.png781×541

  1. Fully working pvp system that uses alliances of the holy vs evil. Obviously holy players
    cant kill holy and evil cant kill evil. Also take note of pvp points.

    sides.png781×541

    evilfriend.png781×541

  2. Edited the construction from old garbage system

    conchair.png781×541

    conportal.png781×541

    contree.png781×541

  3. Holy and Evil city. Both equipped with guards that aggro to the opposing side… Holy guard aggros to evil players
    Also each city has their own skills that are limited to the city not the alliance which means a holy player
    can level an evil skill but it is much harder as to level it he/she must go to evil city… lolz

    evilguards.png781×541

    evilmine.png781×541

    pickinevilcity.png781×541

  4. Yes there are the original 508 bulby customs such as dragon pl8 and full helm yada yada. But some server code side customs include the magic comp bow. C bow also works but forgot to take a picture and dont feel like going back to take more and upload them 0.o
    Chins

    flyingturd.png781×541

    flyingturd2.png781×541

    magic comp ice arrow. Which will ricochet off of 2 people. Hitting a maximum of 3 people with decreasing power.
    Maximum ricochet distance is 5 squares.
    magiccompicearrow-1.png781×541

    magic comp fire arrow. Simply hits target 2 times with decreased power
    magiccompfirearrow-1.png781×541

    fully working autocast for all magic… ancient barrages work on npcs and players
    Ancientsautocast.png781×541

  5. Redid skills with guides and realistic methods for leveling. Also all levels follow the 50x runescape exp rule. Also all npcs use proper animations for attack def and die.

    properanim.png781×541

    rc.png781×541

    evilsmith.png781×541

  6. A pvp city that the holy and evil players battle for. It is similar to a minigame but it is always on and players entry
    to the city is right outside the gate. The city checks the number of holy vs evil players in the city and gives control to that
    side. Every player on the controlling side gets a cash flow from city. This helps the beginning players get some grip. Also the money gained increases by how long that one side has had control and resets when control is lost or changed. 10k,25k,50k,75k,100k and
    stops at 100k which will continually give 100k to controllers.

    evilpvp.png781×541

  7. Also some other little features that I can’t think of. But there is hire slave which is similar to runescape’s assistance but the hirer pays a constant amount per exp gained by the slave. The slave also gets the gold per exp earned for the master. The slave master gets all the exp and is forced to pay or the level is reset to 1. This ensures the master doesn’t try to hire slave without any cash in inv or bank ect. If cash is not found for exp then level that he hired for is set to 1. The funds are automatically calculated for exp earned and the master can set a maximum for how much exp he wants the slave to earn him.

    hireslave.png781×541

------Things I missed------
Sorry forgot but there are pvp shops but I ddn’t take photos and the projectiles DO NOT CRASH CLIENT that has been fixed
and I even posted a Tut which very quickly was replied “snippet” lol.

This server is not public yet and is under extreme construction.

===Credits===
ALL BASE AND CORE CREDITS GO TO MEZZYSCAPE/BULBY/PALIDINO76
For all the changes Credits break Like this
90% Halolouie/Halolouis
2% Username/Kesha
8% Epidemik

Final thoughts…

Flame me and I will eat your first born. =]

item.title: JMadness Server Progress [508] Updated 9/20 HD!
item.dc:creator: @halolouis halolouis
item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:30, topic:348633”][quote author=halolouis link=topic=445013.msg3397006#msg3397006 date=1289527023]
Wow. I guess this server hasn’t died. Due to lack of interest I had dropped this project to move on to something more respectable.

Some one needs to start making original 508’s. It’s getting boring reading the same features over and over again…

Umm. It is pretty original. 4 Custom skills (Luck, Trading, Inscription, Adventuring) , Player owned shops, BOB, Zombie Madness minigame, Faction based Gameplay, Economy driven by a Trader skill and pouches. Yes I understand that those aren’t shown in the pictures but if I spent all my time print screening then I couldn’t code. Anyways, just correcting a statement I find incorrect.
[/quote]You’re right, let me correct myself.

Some one needs to start making original 508’s with good original features that will actually help gameplay.

The only feature there that looks remotely good is player owned shops… which is basically the same as normal trading…[/quote]

That is very fair statement. Sadly it is much easier said than done. I have a hard time thinking of ideas that increase the gameplay. Most ideas usually bog
down the gameplay with their complexity. Any Legitimate suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: JMadness Server Progress [508] Updated 9/20 HD!
item.dc:creator: @halolouis halolouis
item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

Wow. I guess this server hasn’t died. Due to lack of interest I had dropped this project to move on to something more respectable.

Davidi2:

Some one needs to start making original 508’s. It’s getting boring reading the same features over and over again…

Umm. It is pretty original. 4 Custom skills (Luck, Trading, Inscription, Adventuring) , Player owned shops, BOB, Zombie Madness minigame, Faction based Gameplay, Economy driven by a Trader skill and pouches. Yes I understand that those aren’t shown in the pictures but if I spent all my time print screening then I couldn’t code. Anyways, just correcting a statement I find incorrect.

@Everyone
I guess if you think this is something worth the time and effort I will continue my efforts on it to complete it fully. If I can’t find a good host I will release source.

Read full topic

item.title: JMadness Server Progress [508] Updated 9/20 HD!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:24, topic:348633”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=445013.msg3395869#msg3395869 date=1289358375]
Well of course it’s going to have glitches, it’s a 508.

I will admit that I’m not well experienced in 508 types.
